item.title: Trump to address the affordability issue. And, Border Patrol heading to Charlotte
item.description: Americans are feeling the strain of high prices, and now President Trump is preparing to take on the concern. And, Charlotte, N.C., is bracing for Border Patrol agents to arrive in the city.

item.title: BBC apologizes for edit of Trump speech but says it won't provide legal compensation
item.description: The BBC has apologized to President Trump for the way it edited his Jan. 6, 2021 speech but says it won't pay compensation. Trump has threatened a $1 billion lawsuit against the British broadcaster.

item.title: As social media grows more toxic, college athletes ask themselves: Is it worth it?
